code: import React from"react";import{connect}from"react-redux";import{withRouter}from"react-router-dom";import menuConfig from"../../static/administratorMenuConfig";import{LOG_OUT}from"../../constants/actionTypes";var Header=function Header(props){var userName=props.userName,handleLogOut=props.handleLogOut;var getTitle=function getTitle(){var path=props.location.pathname;var title;menuConfig.forEach(function(item){if(item.key===path){title=item.title;}else if(item.children){var cItem=item.children.find(function(cItem){return cItem.key===path;});if(cItem){title=cItem.title;}}});return title;};var title=getTitle();return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{height:"81px",background:"white"}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{width:"100%",height:"40px",display:"flex",justifyContent:"flex-end",alignItems:"center",padding:"0 20px"}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",null,"\u6B22\u8FCE ",userName),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{style:{padding:"0 15px"}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("a",{onClick:function onClick(e){e.preventDefault();localStorage.removeItem('access');handleLogOut();window.location.href="/";}},"\u9000\u51FA"))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{height:"40px",width:"100%",borderTop:"1px solid #7E7E7E",display:"flex",alignItems:"center"}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"adminNavTitle",style:{padding:"0 50px",fontSize:"18px"}},title)));};export default withRouter(connect(function(state){return{userName:state.getIn(["userMana","common","userIdentify"]),login:state.getIn(["userMana","common","login"])};},function(dispatch){return{handleLogOut:function handleLogOut(){dispatch({type:LOG_OUT});}};})(Header));
